= Introduction =
This wiki is used as a help file to guide you through the different features that can be found in the [http://www.zonefivesoftware.com/SportTracks SportTracks] Garmin Workouts plugin.


= Plugin Installation instructions =
  * Download the latest version on your hard drive.
  * Once the download has completed, open the .st2plugin file

If you have a version already installed in [http://www.zonefivesoftware.com/SportTracks SportTracks] you should uninstall the current version prior to installing a new one with the above method.  You can also simply update directly from the Plugins section of the [http://www.zonefivesoftware.com/SportTracks SportTracks] Settings page.

== Important Notes ==
  # This version of the plugin requires the *latest version of [http://www.zonefivesoftware.com/SportTracks SportTracks] which is 2.0.3170 or later*
  # The [http://www.garmin.com/products/communicator Garmin Communicator Plugin] must be *installed and activated in Internet Explorer*.  After it has installed, go to the [http://www.garmin.com/products/communicator/test test page] in Internet Explorer and *allow the ActiveX plugin*. Once this is done, your unit should be detected on the [http://www.garmin.com/products/communicator/test test page].
  # This new export to device feature *won't work on Vista x64* (and possibly XP x64, I need a confirmation on this)
